response.body: [{"id":6,"name":"Dino Megazord","description":"The Megazord (retroactively referred to as the Dino Megazord) is the combination of the five Dinozords: Tyrannosaurus, Pterodactyl, Mastodon, Triceratops, and Sabertooth Tiger. This is the first Megazord to be featured in Power Rangers, but within the chronology of the series may have been preceded by other Zord combinations in the distant past.","type":"dinozord","images":[],"modes":[],"parts":[{"id":2,"name":"Mastodon Dinozord","description":"Its body formed the back and arms of the Megazord and Dragonzord Battle Mode. The head could be utilized as a shield. Alone it could fire frigid blasts of cold air & mist at enemies, temporarily freezing them. Its hiding place was in the deep Arctic.","type":"dinozord"},{"id":3,"name":"Pterodactyl Dinozord","description":"It formed the chestplate of the Megazord, She could fire twin lasers when used individually, which looked like lightning. This was the only Dinozord with flight capability. It remained submerged in a volcano for hiding purposes.","type":"dinozord"},{"id":4,"name":"Sabertooth Tiger Dinozord","description":"Forming the right leg, it could shoot a large yellow laser out of a tail cannon, similar to the triceratops however he could also attack using its teeth. This Zord was by far the fastest, running as transportation. Its hiding place was in the deep Jungle.","type":"dinozord"},{"id":5,"name":"Triceratops Dinozord","description":"Forming the left leg, it could shoot laser shots from a twin cannon (its tail) as well as fire chain-link power cables out of its horns to subdue opponents. The Triceratops remained in the Desert while not in use.","type":"dinozord"},{"id":1,"name":"Tyrannosaurus Dinozord","description":"Forming the head and torso, the Tyrannosaurus was the mightiest of all Dinozords, sometimes acting alone in combat, when it could use its tail and jaws as weapons. It had the ability to fire energy blasts from its eyes. It could also roar so strongly that it created seismic blasts, channeling the Earth as a weapon and vaporizing monsters. It could also stand on his tail and kick his opponent like a kangaroo. The Tyrannosaurus remained underground while not in use.","type":"dinozord"}],"pilots":[{"id":5,"name":"Black Ranger","color":"black"},{"id":4,"name":"Pink Ranger","color":"pink"},{"id":2,"name":"Yellow Ranger","color":"yellow"},{"id":3,"name":"Blue Ranger","color":"blue"},{"id":1,"name":"Red Ranger","color":"red"}]},{"id":8,"name":"Dino Ultrazord","description":"An Ultrazord is a combination of all or nearly all the existing Zords a Ranger team possesses.","type":"dinozord","images":[],"modes":[],"parts":[{"id":7,"name":"Mega Dragonzord","description":"The Dragonzord also had the ability to combine with the entire original Megazord to form the Mega Dragonzord. In this formation, the Dragonzord turned into a sort of armor that would lay atop the Megazord, turning its finger cannons into shoulder cannons.  Its primary attack consisted of a three-pronged energy attack generated by the Dragonzord symbols on the arms and the Megazord's chestplate.","type":"dinozord"},{"id":9,"name":"Titanus","description":"Titanus is a giant brachiosaurus Carrierzord used by the Mighty Morphin Power Rangers.","type":"carrierzord"}],"pilots":[{"id":5,"name":"Black Ranger","color":"black"},{"id":4,"name":"Pink Ranger","color":"pink"},{"id":2,"name":"Yellow Ranger","color":"yellow"},{"id":3,"name":"Blue Ranger","color":"blue"},{"id":1,"name":"Red Ranger","color":"red"},{"id":6,"name":"Green Ranger","color":"green"}]},{"id":10,"name":"Dragonzord","description":"The Dragonzord was the zord linked to the green Mighty Morphin power coin.","type":"dinozord","images":[],"modes":[],"parts":[],"pilots":[{"id":6,"name":"Green Ranger","color":"green"}]},{"id":12,"name":"Firebird Thunderzord","description":"The Firebird Thunderzord is the Pink Mighty Morphin Ranger's second Zord. It was created from the Pterodactyl Dinozord, utilizing the former Zord as a template. The Pterodactyl Dinozord would be struck by a pink lightning bolt, transforming it into the Firebird.","type":"thunderzord","images":[{"url":"http://powerapi.blueyes.nl/static/media/zords/MMPR_Firebird_Thunderzord.jpg"}],"modes":[],"parts":[],"pilots":[{"id":4,"name":"Pink Ranger","color":"pink"}]},{"id":14,"name":"Griffin Thunderzord","description":"The Sabertooth Tiger Dinozord was the template to create the more powerful Griffin Thunderzord. Piloted by Trini Kwan and Aisha Campbell, it could project fireballs when used in combat on its own.","type":"thunderzord","images":[{"url":"http://powerapi.blueyes.nl/static/media/zords/MMPR_Griffin_Thunderzord.jpg"}],"modes":[],"parts":[],"pilots":[{"id":2,"name":"Yellow Ranger","color":"yellow"}]},{"id":11,"name":"Lion Thunderzord","description":"The Mastodon was the template to create the more powerful Lion Thunderzord. The Zord was piloted by Zack Taylor and later Adam Park. Zordon explained that the Lion had \"courage and strength\". It did not share the same abilities as the Mastodon, but it was given greater armor and defense.","type":"thunderzord","images":[{"url":"http://powerapi.blueyes.nl/static/media/zords/MMPR_Lion_Thunderzord.jpg"}],"modes":[],"parts":[],"pilots":[{"id":5,"name":"Black Ranger","color":"black"}]},{"id":2,"name":"Mastodon Dinozord","description":"Its body formed the back and arms of the Megazord and Dragonzord Battle Mode. The head could be utilized as a shield. Alone it could fire frigid blasts of cold air & mist at enemies, temporarily freezing them. Its hiding place was in the deep Arctic.","type":"dinozord","images":[],"modes":[],"parts":[],"pilots":[{"id":5,"name":"Black Ranger","color":"black"}]},{"id":7,"name":"Mega Dragonzord","description":"The Dragonzord also had the ability to combine with the entire original Megazord to form the Mega Dragonzord. In this formation, the Dragonzord turned into a sort of armor that would lay atop the Megazord, turning its finger cannons into shoulder cannons.  Its primary attack consisted of a three-pronged energy attack generated by the Dragonzord symbols on the arms and the Megazord's chestplate.","type":"dinozord","images":[],"modes":[],"parts":[{"id":6,"name":"Dino Megazord","description":"The Megazord (retroactively referred to as the Dino Megazord) is the combination of the five Dinozords: Tyrannosaurus, Pterodactyl, Mastodon, Triceratops, and Sabertooth Tiger. This is the first Megazord to be featured in Power Rangers, but within the chronology of the series may have been preceded by other Zord combinations in the distant past.","type":"dinozord"},{"id":10,"name":"Dragonzord","description":"The Dragonzord was the zord linked to the green Mighty Morphin power coin.","type":"dinozord"}],"pilots":[{"id":5,"name":"Black Ranger","color":"black"},{"id":4,"name":"Pink Ranger","color":"pink"},{"id":2,"name":"Yellow Ranger","color":"yellow"},{"id":3,"name":"Blue Ranger","color":"blue"},{"id":1,"name":"Red Ranger","color":"red"},{"id":6,"name":"Green Ranger","color":"green"}]},{"id":3,"name":"Pterodactyl Dinozord","description":"It formed the chestplate of the Megazord, She could fire twin lasers when used individually, which looked like lightning. This was the only Dinozord with flight capability. It remained submerged in a volcano for hiding purposes.","type":"dinozord","images":[],"modes":[],"parts":[],"pilots":[{"id":4,"name":"Pink Ranger","color":"pink"}]},{"id":15,"name":"Red Dragon Thunderzord","description":"The Red Dragon Thunderzord was the second Zord of the Red Mighty Morphin Power Ranger (Jason Lee Scott and Rocky DeSantos) and the successor to the Tyrannosaurus Dinozord.","type":"thunderzord","images":[{"url":"http://powerapi.blueyes.nl/static/media/zords/MMPR_Red_Dragon.jpg"},{"url":"http://powerapi.blueyes.nl/static/media/zords/MMPR_Red_Dragon_Thunderzord_Warrior_Mode.jpg"}],"modes":[],"parts":[],"pilots":[{"id":1,"name":"Red Ranger","color":"red"}]},{"id":4,"name":"Sabertooth Tiger Dinozord","description":"Forming the right leg, it could shoot a large yellow laser out of a tail cannon, similar to the triceratops however he could also attack using its teeth. This Zord was by far the fastest, running as transportation. Its hiding place was in the deep Jungle.","type":"dinozord","images":[],"modes":[],"parts":[],"pilots":[{"id":2,"name":"Yellow Ranger","color":"yellow"}]},{"id":17,"name":"Thunder Megazord","description":"The Thunder Megazord is created by merging the five Thunderzords: the Red Dragon, Lion, Unicorn, Griffin and Firebird. It was more powerful and resilient than its predecessor, capable of resisting Lord Zedd's attempts to enslave it without the aid of any external signal-blockers. The Rangers piloted the Thunder Megazord from the green orb on its chest.","type":"thunderzord","images":[{"url":"http://powerapi.blueyes.nl/static/media/zords/MMPR_Thundermegazord.jpg"}],"modes":[],"parts":[{"id":12,"name":"Firebird Thunderzord","description":"The Firebird Thunderzord is the Pink Mighty Morphin Ranger's second Zord. It was created from the Pterodactyl Dinozord, utilizing the former Zord as a template. The Pterodactyl Dinozord would be struck by a pink lightning bolt, transforming it into the Firebird.","type":"thunderzord"},{"id":14,"name":"Griffin Thunderzord","description":"The Sabertooth Tiger Dinozord was the template to create the more powerful Griffin Thunderzord. Piloted by Trini Kwan and Aisha Campbell, it could project fireballs when used in combat on its own.","type":"thunderzord"},{"id":11,"name":"Lion Thunderzord","description":"The Mastodon was the template to create the more powerful Lion Thunderzord. The Zord was piloted by Zack Taylor and later Adam Park. Zordon explained that the Lion had \"courage and strength\". It did not share the same abilities as the Mastodon, but it was given greater armor and defense.","type":"thunderzord"},{"id":15,"name":"Red Dragon Thunderzord","description":"The Red Dragon Thunderzord was the second Zord of the Red Mighty Morphin Power Ranger (Jason Lee Scott and Rocky DeSantos) and the successor to the Tyrannosaurus Dinozord.","type":"thunderzord"},{"id":13,"name":"Unicorn Thunderzord","description":"The Triceratops was the template to create the more powerful Unicorn Thunderzord. Piloted by Billy Cranston, it could launch large boulders at foes.","type":"thunderzord"}],"pilots":[{"id":4,"name":"Pink Ranger","color":"pink"},{"id":2,"name":"Yellow Ranger","color":"yellow"},{"id":5,"name":"Black Ranger","color":"black"},{"id":1,"name":"Red Ranger","color":"red"},{"id":3,"name":"Blue Ranger","color":"blue"}]},{"id":16,"name":"Thunderzord Assault Team","description":"The Thunderzords could combine to form the Thunderzord Assault Team. The Lion, Unicorn, Griffin, and Firebird would combine into an airborne chariot, which the Red Dragon would ride in his warrior mode.","type":"thunderzord","images":[{"url":"http://powerapi.blueyes.nl/static/media/zords/Assault_Team.jpg"}],"modes":[],"parts":[{"id":12,"name":"Firebird Thunderzord","description":"The Firebird Thunderzord is the Pink Mighty Morphin Ranger's second Zord. It was created from the Pterodactyl Dinozord, utilizing the former Zord as a template. The Pterodactyl Dinozord would be struck by a pink lightning bolt, transforming it into the Firebird.","type":"thunderzord"},{"id":14,"name":"Griffin Thunderzord","description":"The Sabertooth Tiger Dinozord was the template to create the more powerful Griffin Thunderzord. Piloted by Trini Kwan and Aisha Campbell, it could project fireballs when used in combat on its own.","type":"thunderzord"},{"id":11,"name":"Lion Thunderzord","description":"The Mastodon was the template to create the more powerful Lion Thunderzord. The Zord was piloted by Zack Taylor and later Adam Park. Zordon explained that the Lion had \"courage and strength\". It did not share the same abilities as the Mastodon, but it was given greater armor and defense.","type":"thunderzord"},{"id":15,"name":"Red Dragon Thunderzord","description":"The Red Dragon Thunderzord was the second Zord of the Red Mighty Morphin Power Ranger (Jason Lee Scott and Rocky DeSantos) and the successor to the Tyrannosaurus Dinozord.","type":"thunderzord"},{"id":13,"name":"Unicorn Thunderzord","description":"The Triceratops was the template to create the more powerful Unicorn Thunderzord. Piloted by Billy Cranston, it could launch large boulders at foes.","type":"thunderzord"}],"pilots":[{"id":4,"name":"Pink Ranger","color":"pink"},{"id":2,"name":"Yellow Ranger","color":"yellow"},{"id":5,"name":"Black Ranger","color":"black"},{"id":1,"name":"Red Ranger","color":"red"},{"id":3,"name":"Blue Ranger","color":"blue"}]},{"id":9,"name":"Titanus","description":"Titanus is a giant brachiosaurus Carrierzord used by the Mighty Morphin Power Rangers.","type":"carrierzord","images":[],"modes":[],"parts":[],"pilots":[]},{"id":19,"name":"Tor the Shuttlezord","description":"As the rangers struggled against Lord Zedd's monster Four Head, Zordon introduced them to a new Carrierzord that could combine with their Thunderzords. Tor was created when Zordon fused a green crystal with a turtle. The zord could transform into a Warrior mode by \"standing up\" and retracting its head and neck; Tor's back would then become the front of the zord. In this mode, it could shoot rockets out of its fingertips, and could open up its chest for the Red Dragon Thunderzord to enter it and re-energize.","type":"carrierzord","images":[],"modes":[],"parts":[],"pilots":[]},{"id":5,"name":"Triceratops Dinozord","description":"Forming the left leg, it could shoot laser shots from a twin cannon (its tail) as well as fire chain-link power cables out of its horns to subdue opponents. The Triceratops remained in the Desert while not in use.","type":"dinozord","images":[],"modes":[],"parts":[],"pilots":[{"id":3,"name":"Blue Ranger","color":"blue"}]},{"id":1,"name":"Tyrannosaurus Dinozord","description":"Forming the head and torso, the Tyrannosaurus was the mightiest of all Dinozords, sometimes acting alone in combat, when it could use its tail and jaws as weapons. It had the ability to fire energy blasts from its eyes. It could also roar so strongly that it created seismic blasts, channeling the Earth as a weapon and vaporizing monsters. It could also stand on his tail and kick his opponent like a kangaroo. The Tyrannosaurus remained underground while not in use.","type":"dinozord","images":[],"modes":[],"parts":[],"pilots":[{"id":1,"name":"Red Ranger","color":"red"}]},{"id":13,"name":"Unicorn Thunderzord","description":"The Triceratops was the template to create the more powerful Unicorn Thunderzord. Piloted by Billy Cranston, it could launch large boulders at foes.","type":"thunderzord","images":[{"url":"http://powerapi.blueyes.nl/static/media/zords/MMPR_Unicorn_Thunderzord.jpg"}],"modes":[],"parts":[],"pilots":[{"id":3,"name":"Blue Ranger","color":"blue"}]},{"id":18,"name":"White Tigerzord","description":"With the creation of the White Power Ranger, Zordon gave Tommy the new White Tigerzord to provide the necessary backup against Lord Zedd's monsters. As the name suggests, he is based off a white tiger. Tommy summoned and controlled the Zord with his talking saber, Saba.","type":"thunderzord","images":[{"url":"http://powerapi.blueyes.nl/static/media/zords/MMPR_Tigerzord.jpg"}],"modes":[{"id":1,"name":"Tiger Mode","description":"Tiger mode is the primary form that the Tigerzord takes when entering battle. It can not only move fast, but can emit powerful sonic blasts at opponents. The Red Dragon Thunderzord can ride on the Tigerzord and use its staff to strike oncoming foes. For the Thunder Ultrazord configuration, Tigerzord in tiger mode was placed inside of Tor the Shuttlezord's shell.","images":[{"url":"http://powerapi.blueyes.nl/static/media/zords/modes/MMPR_Tigerzord.jpg"}]},{"id":2,"name":"Warrior mode","description":"The primary fighting form, Warrior mode is equipped with a sword, and can fire powerful \"White Tiger Thunderbolts\" in the form of energy fireballs at his opponents. It has also demonstrated the ability to follow the White Ranger's every move, first used against the monster Nimrod. Tigerzord would often fight alongside the Thunder Megazord in this mode.","images":[{"url":"http://powerapi.blueyes.nl/static/media/zords/modes/MMPR_Tigerzord_Warrior_Mode.jpg"}]}],"parts":[],"pilots":[{"id":7,"name":"White Ranger","color":"white"}]}]
